attributes.additional_details: I strongly belive that any form of physical punishment of children should be illigal. It is never accepitable for an adult to hit a child. There are many better ways to teach a child how to behave.
attributes.background: Bring the law in England inline with Scotland to ban physical punishment of children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559501
